processing_notes: Source states: 'Rwanda: As of 04 April 2025, four new cases have been reported. Since 1 January 2025 and as of 04 April 2025, four cases have been reported' - interpreted as 4 suspected cholera cases

Source states: 'first case reported on December 29, 2005 in Masaka district, and by January 5, 2006, a total of 68 cases had been reported to the hospital' and '10 lives' - interpreted as 68 suspected cases, 10 deaths

Source states: 'Rwanda has been been suffering from a cholera outbreak with a total of 2900 cases and 55 deaths, most of which were reported in September' - interpreted as 2900 suspected cases, 55 deaths
Source states: 'From 2010 to 2017, Rwanda reported 17 cholera outbreaks with 420 cases and 6 deaths' - interpreted as 420 suspected cases, 6 deaths over 7-year period
Source confirms: 'In comparison, in 2024 and as of 2 May 2024, no cases were reported from Rwanda' - validated zero cholera transmission during 2024 via WHO surveillance system
